channel.title: the unicorn – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: Peter Grudzien- The Unicorn
item.dc:creator: Robert Dayton
item.description: So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day: Peter Grudzien- … Continue reading "Peter Grudzien- The Unicorn"
item.content:encoded:
So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day:

Peter Grudzien- The Unicorn
To be
